title: Council Directive 86/655/EEC of 18 December 1986 concerning the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of Directive 75/268/EEC (France)
header:
COUNCIL  DIRECTIVE
of 18 December 1986
converning the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within  the meaning of Directive 75/268/EEC (France)
(86/655/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The areas in the territory of the French Republic listed in the Annex  are hereby added to the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of Article  3 (4) and (5) of Directive 75/268/EEC.
This Directive is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 December 1986.
For the Council
The President
M. JOPLING
(1) OJ N° L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ N° L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(3) Opinion delivered on 12 December 1986 (not yet published in the Official Journal).
(4) OJ N° L 128, 19. 5. 1985, p. 33.
(5) OJ N° L 108, 26. 4. 1976, p. 22.
(6) OJ N° L 223, 16. 8. 1976, p. 7.
(7) OJ N° L 58, 3. 3. 1977, p. 22.
